column5: Anyone know where I can find red or blood treble hooks in 1/0, or 2/0 size? Want to replace hooks on some large spoons.
Did you try www.barlowstackle.com www.staminainc.com or www.jannsnetcraft.com ?
I just noticed that they do have them in the Cabelas salt water catalog so you should be able to order them from Cabelas ( I think they were VMC but don't remember for sure).
